name: Notion Ultimate Bills Tracker
description: Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g., {{InvoiceNumber}}, {{ClientName}}). Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching head
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Easy-to-use interface:An intuitive and easy-to-use interface. It is simple to add your bills and pay them as they are due.; Historical tracking:Pay your bills based on their due period and put them under 3 categories asUpcoming Bills,Bills Past Due, andBills Paid.; Set the right frequency of expenses:Pay the bills based on how frequently they occur such as Daily expenses, One Time expenses, Monthly Expenses etc.; Pay the bills based on priority:Set the priority for each bill and pay them as per your defined priority on time.
